title: permabanned ?
body: um i got permabanned which is fe but im wondering what did my reports do lol. people say much worse things to me, int im my games, troll me but i get permabanned? just curious. im not mentally stable to play league anyway.

replies.body:
I had 2 IFS thingos come up yesterday, no idea of the severity

It does work, but i think it takes too long, those 2 IFS came a week after my reports (since i haven't had a need to report for a week)

I've been perma'd (this acc) but it was deserved as have all my bans over the years

if you said anything remotely toxic like calling someone a retard, or using the 'N' word, etc you will get picked up and banned as long as someone reported you, otherwise you can get away scott free, so chances are, no one has reported them except you, which means there will need to be more reports in order for it to work

as for your ban, theres a good chance you deserved it (self-admitted instability, etc) post the logs, and we'll be able to see if you deserved it

BTW if you deemed that the ban was illogical or undeserved, go send them a support ticket, they'll blanket response you, but they will supply logs, and from memory (since i haven't been banned in 3 months) they bold what they deemed to be toxic.

No point debating about it man, the report system is fucken broken; people can be unscathed with comments encouraging suicide however making objective statements about another player's soft inting antics is considered perm-bannable. Just move on from this piece of trash game. Riot are the result of their own downfall... and they'll have to deal with the repercussions in a few years.


P.S: This forum is full of Riot nut huggers - so they're going to give you some generic reply justifying your ban; they're as toxic with their lack of contribution to society, and are too worried about getting other players banned as their sole kick of satisfaction in their lives.
im glad im not the only one that thinks riot banning system is corrupt. allowing anyone to report me. even if its a meme, i get banned

Reports don't mean anything if they are invalid. Vast majority of the time if you hadn't done anything that broke the guidelines you wouldn't have been punished. False positives are rare.

Riot doesn't give out information on other people punishments (be that the what, why or how) for the sake of privacy and to encourage reform/prevent witch-hunting.

As for your own punishment, we can't tell you anything beyond the extremely basic without knowing why you were punished. If you want community feedback on your ban I'd recommend posting your reform card (or at least your chat logs). Whether or not you have had any previous punishments also determines a lot and is very useful information for feedback.

You seem to have a lot of vested emotion into a game that's supposedly trash.

This is the problem with angry people such as yourself, you can never self criticise and take responsibility of your behaviour that's why you were banned. Couldn't sit back take a breather, re-think your life philosophies and here's an alien word for you "Reflect".

You project blame so now the majority have spoken. Your behaviour is not accepted in the community, improve on it. Don't spiral into more anger as you're doing again. You won't win that war.

I've yet to be banned for being "toxic" and sometimes I do say a lot of mean things to players who are negative or int. 

I think the system is pretty fair, you can submit a support ticket if you want and Riot can be the judge of whether your actions were justified or  not.

P.S. The toxic people/inters that I report do get banned. So the system does work and it isn't all that bad. However, there were like 2 inters who are yet to be banned. If you int in the game and don't say a single word, you don't get banned (for whatever reason).
